SEARCH
Module net.tangly.fsm
Package net.tangly.fsm

Interface StateMachine<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>>

Type Parameters:
O - the class of the instance owning the finite state machine instance or the context in which the machine is executed
S - the state enumeration type uniquely identifying a state in the state machine
E - the event enumeration type uniquely identifying the event sent to the state machine
public interface StateMachine<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>>
The finite state machine executing a hierarchical finite state machine description.

    Return true if the finite state machine is in a non-final state and will process further events.

  • Method Details

    • fire

      boolean fire(@NotNull @NotNull Event<E> event)
      Fire the specified event and processes all associated actions.
      Parameters:
      event - the event to process
      Returns:
      flag indicating if a transition was fired or not

    • reset

      void reset()
      Reset the state machine to his start state. All history information is erased.

    • name

      String name()
      Return the name of this state machine.
      Returns:
      name of the state machine if defined otherwise null

    • isAlive

      boolean isAlive()
      Return true if the finite state machine is in a non-final state and will process further events.
      Returns:
      flag indicating if the machine is in a non-final state

    • isRegistered

      boolean isRegistered(@NotNull @NotNull StateMachineEventHandler<O,S,E> handler)
      Return true if the given handler is registered in the state machine.
      Parameters:
      handler - handler whose registration shall be verified
      Returns:
      true if the handler is registered otherwise false
